title: Filter anomalies by voice
description: Verify that the anomalies list filters correctly when selecting a specific Bible voice.

steps.description: Navigate to the Bible Anomalies page
Select a specific voice from the voice filter dropdown
Check that anomalies list updates to show only anomalies related to the selected voice

title: Filter anomalies by multiple criteria (voice, book, anomaly type, status)
description: Verify filtering functionality works properly when multiple filters are applied simultaneously.

steps.description: Navigate to the Bible Anomalies page
Select a voice, book, anomaly type, and status from their respective filters
Anomalies list displays only entries matching all selected filter criteria

title: Anomalies list displays correct columns and data
description: Verify that the anomalies table shows columns: code, reference, word, anomaly type, info, ratio, status, and action buttons, populated with correct data.

steps.description: Load anomalies list with no filters applied
Verify visibility of all required columns in the anomalies table
Check data correctness and format in each column for at least one anomaly

title: Play verse audio using list play button
description: Verify that clicking the play button in the anomalies list plays the verse audio with correct highlighting.

steps.description: Select an anomaly with available audio
Click the play button next to the anomaly in the list
Audio playback starts smoothly and verse timing is highlighted in sync

title: Floating mini audio player controls functionality
description: Verify the floating mini audio player displays and its controls (play, pause, next, previous) function correctly.

steps.description: Play a verse audio from the anomalies list
Floating mini audio player appears
Use play/pause control and verify audio playback behavior
Use next and previous buttons and verify audio changes accordingly

title: Quick check mode plays verse beginnings and ends fast
description: Verify quick check mode plays beginnings and ends of verses rapidly for fast anomaly assessment.

steps.description: Activate quick check mode for a selected verse
Verify playback plays fast segments from verse start and end

title: Manual timing correction updates start/end correctly
description: Verify manual adjustment tools allow changing start and end times with multiple precision steps and updates are saved.

steps.description: Open timing correction interface for a verse
Change start time using fine adjustment controls
Change end time using coarse adjustment controls
Preview audio with updated timings
Apply timing correction
Verify that the new start/end times are persisted and reflected in the anomaly data

title: Detect and indicate overlapping verse timings
description: Validate that when verse timings overlap, the system detects the issue and visually indicates the overlap to the user.

steps.description: Load anomalies where verse timings have intentional overlaps
System visually indicates overlaps (e.g., highlighting, warnings)

title: Fix overlapping timings through provided tools
description: Verify that users can fix detected verse timing overlaps via provided correction tools and updated timings resolve overlap.

steps.description: Select overlapped verse anomaly
Use timing correction tools to adjust start/end times
Apply changes
Overlap indication disappears and timing data reflects correction

title: Change anomaly status using dropdown in list
description: Verify that anomaly status can be updated from the dropdown control in the anomalies list and changes persist.

steps.description: Open status dropdown on an anomaly item in the list
Select new status from the dropdown options
Status updates instantly in the UI and persists after page reload

title: Create manual anomaly ticket
description: Verify manual anomaly ticket creation dialog is functional, captures required data, saves correctly, and updates anomalies list.

steps.description: Open manual anomaly creation dialog
Fill in required fields with anomaly details
Submit the ticket
New anomaly ticket appears in the anomalies list with correct details

title: Auto advance loads next anomaly after status update
description: Verify that with Auto Advance enabled, after confirming or correcting an anomaly, the system automatically loads the next anomaly for review.

steps.description: Enable Auto Advance in settings or UI control
Open an anomaly and change its status or apply correction
System automatically loads the next anomaly without user manual navigation

title: Verify edge case: no anomalies displayed when filters exclude all
description: Verify the anomalies list properly shows empty state when filter choices result in no matching anomalies.

steps.description: Apply a combination of filters that yields no anomalies
System displays appropriate empty state message with no errors

title: Verify error handling for failed audio playback
description: Simulate audio playback failure and verify the system displays a meaningful error message without crashing.

steps.description: Attempt to play audio for a verse with a broken or missing audio source
System displays an audio playback error message and user can continue using the app

title: Verify unauthorized access redirects to login
description: Ensure routes are protected and unauthorized access redirects to login page.

steps.description: Attempt direct navigation to Bible Anomalies page without authentication
User is redirected to the login page

title: Verify status changes are properly persisted and refetched
description: Update anomaly status and verify persistence at backend and that subsequent refetches reflect updated status.

steps.description: Change the status of an anomaly
Refresh or reload anomalies list
Verify anomaly displays the updated status
